content.body: Sanity check: are all the !s in https://whatpr.org/infra/249.html#parse-json-into-infra-values correct? I think OwnPropertyKeys/Get() cannot fail on JSON-derived objects and arrays but you never know what someone devious could do...
Does anyone know if there's been progress on a bestFit option for Intl.RelativeTimeFormat? There's an open issue discussing the format it might take, but that hasn't been touched in a while.
